title: As Afghans scramble to escape the Taliban, Fox News hosts lean into anti-refugee rhetoric
content:
1. As Afghans scramble to escape the Taliban, Fox News hosts lean into anti-refugee rhetoric  The Washington Post
  2. Malala Yousafzai breaks silence on Taliban, calls for 'immediate cease-fire'  New York Post
  3. WARNING: GRAPHIC CONTENT – U.N. calls for end to 'chilling' abuses in Afghanistan  Reuters
  4. UN Secretary General to Taliban: The World is Watching  TOLOnews
  5. The world must be ready for the Afghan exodus  Financial Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: アフガニスタンの人々がタリバンから逃れようと必死になっているとき、Fox Newsのホストたちは難民排斥のレトリックに傾倒する。
随着阿富汗人争相逃离塔利班，福克斯新闻的主持人开始发表反难民的言论
隨着阿富汗人爭相逃離塔利班，福克斯新聞的主持人開始發表反難民的言論
